title: BEAUTIFUL CHARLES STREET STUDIO
posting_body: Beautiful Charles Street studio in newly upgraded multifamily portfolio set on top of one of Boston's most quintessential streets.
Find yourself immersed in Charles streets high fashion, mouth watering delicatessens, and modern shops.
This front facing unit is rich with Beacon Hill charm from oversized checker paned windows, robust crown molding, and decorative fireplace.
Stainless steel kitchen is highlighted by a large peninsula with overhanging breakfast bar, ideal for downtown in home dining.
Spacious bathroom with charming pedestal sink and large tub accented by crisp, white subway tile.
Hardwood flooring throughout, 11' ceilings and a Southwest orientation allowing for incredible midday and afternoon light.
Professionally managed property with Butterfly entry system which promotes security and ease of access for residents.
Just a couple of blocks from the Boston Common, Public Garden, Esplanade, The Charles as well as Green, Red, and Blue line T access.
Pricing, brokerage coverage, and availability subject to change without notice based on availability, lease term, and move-in date selected.
Pictures may be of similar unit.
Finishes may be different than pictured in this ad.
The apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.
